characteristics.name: Smart Guns
characteristics.description: Ignore cover, the drones also emit signals that disrupt enemy concentrative, remove an ability being Focused on or an active Buff.

characteristics.name: Neural Overload
characteristics.description: Direct hit overload enemy neural pathways. If the damage is twice the target’s  RES score the target is stunned for a round.

characteristics.name: Reality Distortion
characteristics.description: This weapon fires energy that alters perception and reality for target + Hits, leading to hallucinations, altered sensory inputs, causing them to perceive allies as threats for a round or alternatively cause an enemy to be completely convinced in the existence of an environmental illusion.

characteristics.name: Cognitive Static
characteristics.description: Disrupt a target’s mind, target has a -2 on their next action.

passives.name: Mind Fortress
passives.description: Gain 5 x Tier RES. Allies gain 5 RES if they are Near you.

passives.name: Mastermind
passives.description: Gain +10 NP, when you generate Edge, generate +1 more.

passives.name: Null
passives.description: Enemies you damage are afflicted with Null. Targets with Null must roll a d6, on a 6 they will not act for the round, after rolling, remove Null.
